text: Gujarat Lions (often abbreviated as GL) was a franchise cricket team based in the city of Rajkot. It represented the Indian state Gujarat in the Indian Premier League (IPL). ==History== The team played in the IPL for 2 years (the 2016 and 2017 seasons) as one of the replacements for Chennai Super Kings and Rajasthan Royals, who were both suspended for two seasons due to illegal betting by their respective owners, along with the IPL team Rising Pune Supergiant. The franchise was owned by Intex Technologies. The two teams were abolished in 2018 by BCCI and Chennai Super Kings won IPL 2018, defeating Mumbai Indians and all the other IPL teams successfully off, including Rajasthan Royals fully. ==References== Category:Gujarat Category:Indian Premier League teams
title: Gujarat Lions
